ARABIC: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Nor the word of a fortune-teller - how little heed you pay
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer. Little is it that you reflect!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nor is this the speech of a soothsayer. Little do you reflect!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: nor is it the work of a soothsayer but only a few of you take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Nor is it the speech of a soothsayer; how little do you ponder!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer, little is that you remember!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little is it that you mind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: nor the speech of a soothsayer (little do you remember).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nor diviner's speech - little is it that ye remember!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer -- how little you reflect!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor is it the speech of a sooth- sayer. Little are ye admonished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Nor is it the speech of a soothsayer. Little is the admonition that you take!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer: little admonition it is ye receive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer (or a foreteller), little is that you remember!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: nor is it the speech of a soothsayer little do you remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor is it the speech of a soothsayer—little do you take heed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:42] Nor [is it] the speech of a soothsayer. Little do you remember! (read both verbs either in the second person plural or in the third person plural; the mā [preceding both verbs] is extra, intended for emphasis). The meaning is: they believed and remembered only very few things of what the Prophet (s) did, [things] such as [his] good acts, [his] kindness to kin and abstinence; yet this will be of no avail to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nor diviner's speech) which informs about the future (little is it that ye remember!) you do not take admonition in little or much.
